A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I watched this in theatres when it came out. Just recently tried watching it again on Netflix. It's horrible. Anybody who supports this film is obviously a SJW supporting the obviously political bias throughout the movie or paid off like the critics were here on Rotten Tomatoes. That being said\, I don't mind politics as much as I do bad writing. Reverse character development\, massive plot holes\, Mary Sues\, and the wrong character dying; it's unbelievably terrible. This movie isn't a movie. And I will never consider it as such. It's a slap in the face to true Star Wars fans.
